errorBoundary.title: Something went wrong
errorBoundary.subTitle: An error occurred in the application. We are already working on fixing it.

serverError.ERR_ACCOUNT_ALREADY_EXIST: User with this email already exists
serverError.ERR_INVALID_PASSWORD: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain letters, numbers or special characters
serverError.ERR_AUTH: Authorization is required. Please log in again
serverError.ERR_NOT_ALLOWED: You do not have permission to perform this action
serverError.ERR_NOT_FOUND: The requested page or object was not found
serverError.ERR_INTERNAL_SERVER: An error occurred on the server. Please contact the administrator
